missingDocRequests.title: Denial letter with policy citations
missingDocRequests.whyNeeded: Carrier did not cite policy; need letter that quotes provisions.

objections.verbatim: Damage is excluded under the policy.
objections.whyItFails: No policy language or page cited.
objections.requestedResolution: Provide denial letter that cites specific policy exclusion and page.

requestedResolutionOverall: Obtain denial letter that cites policy provisions.
notesForUser: Objection "Exclusion" should cite policy language; add policy doc or state conditionally.
